ai.instructions: Use search-memories before answering questions about stored knowledge. When saving new memories, suggest organizing them into projects using list-projects first. Display memory titles and relevance scores when presenting results. Never delete memories without explicit user confirmation.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
